meanings.definition: The act of performing as a mime.
meanings.sent1: During the talent show, Sarah's miming was so entertaining.
meanings.sent2: The children were amazed by the miming performance at the circus.
meanings.sent3: The miming of the invisible box trick always gets a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her miming of a trapped bird was so realistic, it brought tears to my eyes.
meanings.sent5: The miming of walking against the wind made the audience feel like they were in a storm.

meanings.definition: Imitating the actions or gestures of someone or something without using words.
meanings.sent1: The silent miming clown made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent2: She did a great job miming the dance moves from the music video.
meanings.sent3: The miming robot at the fair was a hit with the kids.
meanings.sent4: His miming of a broken robot was so convincing, it was almost eerie.
meanings.sent5: The miming of a sneaky spy trying to steal a cookie was both funny and clever.
